title: Core Devs Call: Confirm consensus for Aztl치n Upgrade (Yingchun Edition)
body:
Ref [ECIP-1061](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1061) [ECIP-1072](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1072) #198 #199 #207 #212 #213 #216 #218 

### ETC Core Devs Call - Confirm consensus for Aztl치n Upgrade (Yingchun Edition)

When: **Thursday, December 5, 2019, 1pm UTC**, 60 minutes max.

Where: **Ethereum Classic Discord** https://discord.gg/dwxb6nf `#ecips` channel. Will use/create a voice channel _ad hoc._

Meeting Coordinator: TBD

### Agenda

- Aztl치n Upgrade (Yingchun Edition) ([ECIP-1061](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1061)) is in _"Draft"_ state
  - In the [Nov 27 meeting](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/issues/177) we agreed on scope for Aztl치n Upgrade (= Istanbul - 1884)
  - There was agreement that we should move forward with [ECIP-1072](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1072)
  - However, members in the community, such as Afri, have done actions which violated the common editing protocol, such as [dismissing other editors' review without reason](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/199#event-2837816513).
  - This has resulted in intensive community reactions, with Afri, Shane and Bob supporting reverting the previous community consensus (ECIP-1072) and move back to ECIP-1061, while others, such as Wei, @phyro, @TheEnthusiasticAs insisted on continuing on with ECIP-1072.
  - Wei concluded that this is basically a contentious hard fork, due to community fight, and decided to implement it in `multi-geth` as a contentious hard fork.
- Bob's recommendation
  - Confirm in this call that there is no contention (except Wei).
  - Confirm to move [ECIP-1061](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1061) to  **Last Call** (#199)
  - Confirm to move [ECIP-1072](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1072) to **Rejected** (#218)
  - Better yet would be for Wei to move [ECIP-1072](https://ecips.ethereumclassic.org/ECIPs/ecip-1072) to **Withdrawn** himself, but that does not seem likely (#212)

This is the full scope of the agenda.  We won't add any items to this call.  Laser focus.
